job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: Skills Required:<br>•	Medical device or any regulatory industry company experience required <br>•	Degree in computer science or software engineering or electrical engineering <br>•	5-10+ years’ experience in software development within Linux OS with the help of C/C++.<br>•	Scripting in python is good to have.<br>•	Translating software requirements into software design experience.<br>•	Someone who understands threading and processes in Linux, real time operating systems, UML, software architecture, ITC (interface protocol), write API <br>•	Cyber security private or public keys or encryption is a plus<br>•	IEC 62304 or ISO 14971 risk regulations is a plus<br>•	Soft skills: work well in a team environment under agile methodology<br>
